game.name: Wasteland Punk
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wasteland Punk is a wild post-apocalyptic RPG where you'll venture into radioactive wastelands and impenetrable swamps, inhabited by bandits, mutants, and something far more dangerous... Kill, scavenge, craft, and survive at any cost!
